summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3472 for the improvement of East 55th Street, from 5th Avenue Northeast to 9th Avenue Northeast; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43041, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
